values.name: Very Low
values.description: Adversary is highly unlikely to initiate the threat event.

values.name: Low
values.description: Adversary is unlikely to initiate the threat event.

values.name: Moderate
values.description: Adversary is somewhat likely to initiate the treat event.

values.name: High

values.name: Very High
values.description: Adversary is almost certain to initiate the threat event.
